subject: Re: [junit] Re: Essay: The Trouble With JUnit
msgSnippet: ... You ve heard my French. Would you buy that book? -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your guide to software craftsmanship JUnit Recipes:
messageBody:
Charlie Poole wrote:

> Hi Joe,
>
> > In the worst case, I would write mine in another language,

You've heard my French. Would you buy that book?

2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
